fields.summary: Update studio to new IOS module zip path to match with SDK changes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
h5. Description:
1. A IOS module zip path change https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/10411 was reverted in SDK 7.5.0 to prevent breakage in studio 5.1.1.
2. This reverted change should be included in SDK 8.0.0 as studio 5.1.2 or 5.2.0 is expected to have to have the fix to handle these changes.
fields.summary: IOS: Include reverted changes form PR 10411

comments.body:
Verified the fix for this PR is back ported from studio 6.0.0 & included in studio 5.1.2.201812191831.
Resolving & Closing.
